spotlight_1.name: The Hermitage
spotlight_1.description: Egg-omaniacs can break out of their shells at The Hermitage, where the yolk is truly on us.

spotlight_2.name: ROYCE' Malaysia 2017 Christmas Collection
spotlight_2.description: Throughout December, ROYCE' is spreading the Christmas merriment with its latest selection of beautifully curated chocolates and cookies for this special season.

spotlight_3.name: Wondermama: New Wonder Tapas Menu
spotlight_3.description: Has it been more than half a decade already since Wondermama first opened, bringing its own playful brand of Asian comfort food to Bangsar Village? The team here continues to find new ways to keep things intriguing for customers, recently launching a Wonder Tapas menu that's poised to be crowd-pleasing, available both in Bangsar and 1 Utama.

spotlight_4.name: La Carne by Kopimeo
spotlight_4.description: Meat and bread, the basic building blocks of many meals, form the foundation of La Carne, which means ‘meat’ in Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, and apparently, Shah Alamese.

spotlight_5.name: Tiffin Food Court: Postponed with Immediate Effect
spotlight_5.description: KELANA JAYA, 8 Dec 2017 — Tiffin Food Court, the experiential food event that is scheduled to take place in the 30,000 sq ft disused warehouse in the Sungai Way Free Trade Industrial Zone will be postponed until further notice.

spotlight_6.name: Wine & Cheese Bistro
spotlight_6.description: There's no mystery to what's offered here: Bottles of vino and platters of formaggio.

spotlight_7.name: Mikro
spotlight_7.description: There's nothing like a neighbourhood cafe run by residents who know these surroundings intimately.

spotlight_8.name: Patty & Pie: 2017-2018 Menu
spotlight_8.description: When a restaurant makes a mean burger, bursting with beautifully harmonised flavours, it's a destination that deserves to be bookmarked.

spotlight_9.name: Tiffin Food Court: What to Eat
spotlight_9.description: In Part Two of our preview of this month's Tiffin Food Court, we offer a peek into some of the tasty temptations that over 30 independent F&B purveyors will serve.

spotlight_10.name: Tiffin Food Court: A Celebration of Makan & More

spotlight_11.name: C Wine & Bites
spotlight_11.description: Created by a wine lover, for wine lovers, this cosy den brings the cellars of De Toren, Dominio Romano and more to an intimate corner of Damansara Kim.

spotlight_12.name: Daughter Peoh
spotlight_12.description: The Ang family's nearly 70-year-old legacy of asam laksa spreads this month to Subang, extending to a new generation of the clan whose culinary roots rest in the beloved stall their matriarch started in Penang's Air Itam market.

spotlight_13.name: Wings N Boar
spotlight_13.description: Taking flight in Cheras, Wings N Boar is represented by a mascot of a feathered hog that illustrates the specialities of this cheerful cafe - chicken, pork and other meaty temptations, showcased in styles that take cues from as far-flung as Louisiana and Hawaii.

spotlight_14.name: D'Legends Bar: Austria Week with Chef Markus Fasser
spotlight_14.description: From Tyrol to TTDI: Austrian chef Markus Fasser returnsfor a second year to Taman Tun Dr Ismail's D'Legends Bar, bringing a dozen authentic Austrian bistro-style favourites to KL for five days only, on December 5-9, 2017.

spotlight_15.name: Baan Rao
spotlight_15.description: With countless Thai restaurants scattered throughout Greater Kuala Lumpur, it can be challenging to stand out.

spotlight_16.name: Chequers: New Branch
spotlight_16.description: After three years of serving up American-inspired comfort fare in TTDI, KL's top venue for elaborate waffle creations has launched its second outpost.

spotlight_17.name: Little Collins: Christmas Cakes
spotlight_17.description: It might still be six weeks till Christmas, but the little elves of Little Collins are already hard at work.

spotlight_18.name: New Menu: Interlude, TTDI
spotlight_18.description: Resilient after four full years in TTDI, Interlude has evolved a lot since its earliest incarnation.
